mapper.select: SELECT NO , NAME , ID , PWD , BIRTH , HP , EMAIL , QUIT_YN , LOCATION_NO , GENDER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND QUIT_YN = 'N'
SELECT NO ,NAME ,ID ,PWD ,BIRTH ,HP ,EMAIL ,QUIT_YN ,JOIN_DATE ,LOCATION_NO ,GENDER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{name} AND ID = #{id} AND BIRTH = #{birth}
SELECT NO ,NAME ,ID ,PWD ,BIRTH ,HP ,EMAIL ,LOCATION_NO ,GENDER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT K.MARKET_NO , K.WRITER , K.TITLE , K.CONTENT , K.PRICE , K.ENROLL_DATE , K.EDIT_DATE , K.DELETE_YN , K.LOCATION_NO , K.STATUS_YN , L.LOCATION_NAME as locationName , M.NAME as writerName , M.ID as writerId , A.ORIGIN_NAME as originName , A.CHANGE_NAME as changeName , A.DELETE_YN as deleteYnAttach FROM MARKET K LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON (K.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (K.WRITER = M.NO) LEFT JOIN MARKET_ATTACH A ON (K.MARKET_NO = A.MARKET_NO) WHERE K.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND K.WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY MARKET_NO DESC

SELECT F.FRIEND_NO , F.WRITER , F.TITLE , F.CONTENT , F.ENROLL_DATE , F.DELETE_YN , F.EDIT_DATE , F.LOCATION_NO , L.LOCATION_NAME as locationName , M.NAME as writerName , M.ID as writerId FROM FRIEND F LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON (F.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.WRITER = M.NO) WHERE F.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND F.WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY F.FRIEND_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(MARKET_NO) FROM MARKET WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WRITER = #{writer}
SELECT COUNT(FRIEND_NO) FROM FRIEND WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WRITER = #{writer}
